columns.name: domain_id
columns.description: The id of the domain.

columns.name: domain_name
columns.description: The name of the domain.

columns.name: engine_type
columns.description: Specifies the EngineType of the domain.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain

columns.name: access_policies
columns.description: The IAM access policies of the domain.

columns.name: created
columns.description: The domain creation status.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: The domain deletion status.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The domain endpoint that is used to submit index and search requests.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: The domain's OpenSearch version.

columns.name: processing
columns.description: The status of the domain configuration.

columns.name: upgrade_processing
columns.description: The status of the domain version upgrade.

columns.name: node_to_node_encryption_options_enabled
columns.description: Specifies the status of the node to node encryption status.

columns.name: advanced_options
columns.description: Specifies the status of the advanced options.

columns.name: advanced_security_options
columns.description: Specifies The current status of the OpenSearch domain's advanced security options.

columns.name: auto_tune_options
columns.description: The current status of the domain's auto-tune options.

columns.name: cluster_config
columns.description: The type and number of instances in the domain.

columns.name: cognito_options
columns.description: The cognito options for the specified domain.

columns.name: domain_endpoint_options
columns.description: The current status of the domain's endpoint options.

columns.name: ebs_options
columns.description: The EBSOptions for the specified domain.

columns.name: encryption_at_rest_options
columns.description: The status of the encryption at rest options.

columns.name: endpoints
columns.description: Map containing the domain endpoints used to submit index and search requests.

columns.name: log_publishing_options
columns.description: Log publishing options for the given domain.

columns.name: service_software_options
columns.description: The current status of the domain's service software.

columns.name: snapshot_options
columns.description: Specifies the status of the snapshot options.

columns.name: vpc_options
columns.description: The vpc options for the specified domain.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the domain.
